titlestmt.titleproper: Lear, Edward, 1812-1888. Edward Lear miscellaneous drawings, 1849-1866 (MS Typ 55.14): Guide.

change.item: hou01459 converted by Harvard University Library OIS from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2006-06-08).

titlepage.titleproper: Lear, Edward, 1812-1888. Edward Lear miscellaneous drawings, 1849-1866: Guide.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: Â© 2003 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University
did.abstract: Drawings, poems, proofs, landscapes, portraits and other items by the English poet and artist Edward Lear.

acqinfo.p: Unless otherwise noted, gift of Philip Hofer, 1942.

userestrict.p: Images linked to this finding aid are intended for public access and educational use. This material is owned and/or held by the Houghton Library, and is provided solely for the purpose of teaching or individual research. Any other use, including commercial reuse, mounting on other systems, or other forms of redistribution requires the permission of the curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation for Publication:
prefercite.p: Edward Lear Miscellaneous Drawings, 1849-1866 (MS Typ 55.14). Houghton Library, Harvard University.

bioghist.p: Lear was an English poet and artist.

arrangement.p: Arranged in rough alphabetical order by title.

scopecontent.p: Includes Lear's nonsense drawings, autograph manuscript drafts of the nonsense poems and nonsense alphabet, drawings with verse, and proofs for The nonsense alphabet and other works. Also includes a few landscape drawings, a portrait of an unidentified man, self-portraits, and a portrait photograph of Lear, among other items.

relatedmaterial.p: The majority of Lear landscape drawings are listed in MS Typ 55.11, MS Typ 55.26, and TypDr 805.L513
